name: ArgoVPN
title: argovpn.com
shortDescription: ArgoVPN is a free VPN tool designed specifically for Android users in Iran to bypass internet censorship. It offers unlimited bandwidth, allowing users to access blocked websites, social media, and messaging apps. The VPN includes features typically found in commercial VPNs, such as a customizable firewall and the ability to set up private bridges on personal domain names.
pros: Ability to set up private bridges
cons: Primarily focused on users in Iran
No clear information on encryption standards

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: NordVPN
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Offers a wide range of global servers

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: ExpressVPN
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Known for strong encryption and privacy

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: ProtonVPN
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Focuses on security and is open source
